downloadToSeeMessage: Download the CV to see it
description: Building quality websites and applications with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

professionalProfile.title: Professional profile
professionalProfile.content: Enthusiastic about technology, programming and learning something new every day. With over 5 years of hands-on experience in JavaScript . I have been a programmer from an early age and since then I have had a relentless drive to continually expand my skill set. I am always looking to improve my skills as a programmer and as a person. I like to teach and motivate other people what I have learned and how to improve their skills. I am a person who is passionate about code quality and doing things right, with the best practices.

tasks: Responsible for projects that involve web development (JS), such as a social event management system, a dining room system for dish order management.
Together with a small team, I developed an ERP (with React and Node), which I was in charge of selecting the technologies and their architecture.
Development of a detainee registration system in React and Node, this system implemented fingerprint and face recognition
Maintenance and creation of new modules for the internal system (ERP) made with PHP.
I was part of the beginning of their new system and developed their mobile app using React Native.
Responsible for developing various web pages for the company's clients. Only using HTML, CSS and VanillaJS and sometimes JQuery.
I made from simple web pages and programs to more elaborate systems, programmed in Java, C#, C++, Visual Basic .Net and PHP

content.school: Computer Systems Engineer, Instituto Tecnológico de Saltillo
IT technician, Centro de Estudios Tecnológicos, Industriales y de Servicio #48

participations.title: Participations and assists
participations.content: Programming and networking competitions. Online courses, congresses, talks, Talent land and hackathons.
